channel.title: Help with my server please
channel.description: alright so i got most of everything down for my server but there is still a couple coding i need to do, only problem is i really can't remember how to do this so you guys got to help me. (The SERVER IS CALLED MTP V2 - Turmoil/Perfect Pking/Minigames - Best Pking source ever! this server can be found in the server downloads list!) 1. i want to change player message when you log into the server, can you tell me what file to find this in, and how to make it send a different player message. 2. when you log onto the server i want all players to start out as super donator status so they can do codes like ::claws, ::chaoticrapier, ect. 3. i want players to start with 500k pkp as they log in also. help with this would let me release my server my tonight so help please!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! thanks!

item.title: Help with my server please
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Just search commands in Client.java until you come across your existing commands and place ^ in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my server please
item.dc:creator: @bello33 bello33
item.description:
@bello33 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup || item") && playerRights >= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { sendMessage("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100 or ::item 995 100"); } }
it is for ::item and ::pickup

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my server please
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

[quote=“mrpopyman, post:8, topic:363078”]do u have ::pickup?[/quote] no i do not have ::pickup either, been trying both, can’t seem to find the correct spot to put the code so that it can recognize ::item, anyways i want my server to be completely spawnible to any player because mopars are very fun that way just need help.

Read full topic

Please answer both.

alright so i got most of everything down for my server but there is still a couple coding i need to do, only problem is i really can’t remember how to do this so you guys got to help me. (The SERVER IS CALLED MTP V2 - Turmoil/Perfect Pking/Minigames - Best Pking source ever! this server can be found in the server downloads list!)

  1. i want to change player message when you log into the server, can you tell me what file to find this in, and how to make it send a different player message.
  2. when you log onto the server i want all players to start out as super donator status so they can do codes like ::claws, ::chaoticrapier, ect.
  3. i want players to start with 500k pkp as they log in also.
